page.title: 18TRAVEL AND SUPPLY, WARDOUR
page.content: {Southern Railway}runs about{ten trains through our area each week day to both {London}and{Exeter}with seven on Sunday.The manned crossing at{Hatch was replaced in{1985}by an unmanned crossing. There are eight buses a day,but none on Sunday going to and from{Salisbury and{Hindon}or{Shaftesbury.}They all go past{Ansty Corner}and five of them go through{Wardour.}The post in{Wardour {Hatch}and{Ansty}is collected twice a day and is deliverd once a day. The are no collections on Sunday. {Green Groceries}are deliverd three or four times a week from{Tisbury.}Milk is deliveierd from{Shaftesbury}and Groceries once a week from{Semley. {Daily newspapers}are delivered from {Tisbury.}The library van comes every two weeks,there are about 15 customers {by Lucy and Camilla.
